A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
SPOILERS!
Making something of Rey handing over the lightsaber? - Nah
Explaining Rey's Mary Sue super powers? - Nah
Revealing the mystery of Rey's parents? - Nah
Revealing the mystery of Snoke's background - Nah
Making Finn's back injury have an effect?- Nah
Developing or revealing something about Phasma? - Nah
Allowing Luke Skywalker to be bad-ass - Nah
Punishing Poe for mutiny and causing deaths? - Nah
Adding gaping plot holes? - Yes!  And not just a few.

WORST. "STAR WARS". MOVIE. EVER. 
I cared more about the characters in Rogue One than I do about anyone left after TLJ. Mark Hamill tried to warn us!
